DOC.brief_summary: Our research significance polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) human development . Specifically , assess effect docosahexanoic acid ( DHA ) supplementation pregnancy infant growth development randomize control intervention trial Cuernavaca , Mexico . This collaborative effort Rollins School Public Health , Emory University , Instituto Nacional de Salud Publica ( INSP ) Instituto Mexicano del Seguro Social ( IMSS ) , Cuernavaca , Mexico . Pregnant woman attend IMSS General Hospital I recruit 18-22 wks gestation assign randomly receive either DHA ( 400 mg ) placebo daily delivery . The main study outcome include ) birth outcome : birth size , gestational age , cord blood level DHA neurodevelopment b ) maternal blood breast milk DHA level 1 3 mo post-partum ) c ) postnatal growth development first 5 year age ) infant DHA status 3 , 12 18 mo . All data collection carry study headquarters ( IMSS ) except home environment assess home visit . Physical growth ( length , weight , head circumference ) infant child development ( visual auditory evoke potential , visual attention , Bayley scale infant development , McCarthy child development score , Hearts Flowers stroop test , computerize child development test ) measure birth , 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 18 , 24 , 36 mo 4 5 year age train worker . Data also obtain socioeconomic status , obstetric history , maternal diet , anthropometry intelligence , quality home environment infant feeding practice . Data analysis include group comparison ( intent-to-treat ) ensure effectiveness randomization , structural equation model examine various pathway DHA supplementation pregnancy affect child growth development . The finding project contribute significantly understanding functional consequence DHA supplementation pregnancy .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Prenatal DHA Supplements Infant Development
